prompt: I need you to review a map of the Slavic Village Neighborhood in Cleveland Ohio. I need to know what borders the neighborhood. Borders do not have to be directly lateral (east/west moving) or vertical (north/south moving). I want the borders labeled as highways, state routes, or major arterials. Please give me the borders in one array with their directionality in another array
